S.FORM: Nana ji ka dhuq ku sapah pyasan saya.
Nana ji ka dhoq ko sapah pyasan saya.
S.TRANSL: 我今天七點到學校。
I arrived at school at seven today.

S.FORM: Smluhay muyas da, mtmay nniqan slhayan ka mptusa, rmngaw ka mdudul mpuyas " Tutuy ! Thmuku."
Smlohay moyas da, mtmay nniqan slhayan ka mptosa, rmngaw ka mdodol mpoyas " Totoy ! Thmoko."
S.TRANSL: 上課了，老師走進教室，班長說:「起立!敬禮!」
It’s time for class , the teacher walked into the classroom, and the monitor said: “Stand up! Salute!”

S.FORM: Tpuyaq nami rmngaw kana, :Mputsa
Tpoyaq nami rmngaw kana, :Mpotsa
S.TRANSL: We said loudly, “Hi, teacher.”
sndamac su balay.”"

S.FORM: Smluhay nami muyas cida, tmsa smpu kari Sediq ka mptusa.
Smlohay nami moyas cida, tmsa smpo kari Sediq ka mptosa.
S.TRANSL: 上課的時候，老師教我們數字的族語。
In class, the teacher taught us the Seediq language of numbers.

S.FORM: Smnul nami mptusa smpu mi, msupu nami muyas uyas spuwan.
Smnol nami mptosa smpo mi, msopo nami moyas oyas spowan.
S.TRANSL: 我們跟著老師唸，我們唱了數字歌。
We followed the teacher to read, we sang the number song.

S.FORM: Ou bay snlhayan mu kari Sediq ka yaku.
Oo bay snlhayan mo kari Sediq ka yako.
S.TRANSL: 我學會好多族語。
I have learned many Seediq languages.

S.FORM: Musa ku sapah pyasan kddiyax, sluhay ku kari Sediq kddiyax, pqbhangun mu rmngaw kari Sediq ni ka bubu mu.
Mosa ko sapah pyasan kddiyax, slohay ko kari Sediq kddiyax, pqbhangon mo rmngaw kari Sediq ni ka bobo mo.
S.TRANSL: 我天天上學，我天天學族語，我要講給媽媽聽。
I go to school every day, I learn the Seediq language every day, and I want to tell my mother.

S.FORM: Temu ka hangan mu.
Temo ka hangan mo.
S.TRANSL: 我的名字是Temu。
My name is Temu.

S.FORM: Walis ka hangan tama mu.
Walis ka hangan tama mo.
S.TRANSL: 我爸爸的名字是Walis。
My dad’s name is Walis.

S.FORM: Kumu ka hangan bubu mu.
Komo ka hangan bobo mo.
S.TRANSL: 我媽媽的名字是Kumu。
My mother’s name is Kumu.

S.FORM: Maxal kngkwasan ka kngkawas mu da.
Maxal kngkwasan ka kngkawas mo da.
S.TRANSL: 我今年10歲。
I am 10 years old.

S.FORM: Niqan ku kingal qbsuran Kulas ka hangan na, maxal kingal kngkwasan ka hiya da.
Niqan ko kingal qbsoran Kolas ka hangan na, maxal kingal kngkwasan ka hiya da.
S.TRANSL: 我有一個哥哥，他叫kulas，他今年11歲。
I have a brother, his name is Kulas, he is 11 years old.

S.FORM: Wa nami msupu muyas mntna kingal sapah pyasan ka yami.
Wa nami msopo moyas mntna kingal sapah pyasan ka yami.
S.TRANSL: 我們在同一間學校讀書。
We study in the same school.

S.FORM: Smkuxul nami muyas uyas ka yami qbsuran mu snaw.
Smkoxol nami moyas oyas ka yami qbsoran mo snaw.
S.TRANSL: 我和哥哥都喜歡唱歌。
Both my brother and I like to sing.

S.FORM: Smkuxul ku tmapaq qsiya ka yaku, kiya u msangay cida, msupu nami musa tmapaq qsiya ka kana tnsapah nami.
Smkoxol ko tmapaq qsiya ka yako, kiya o msangay cida, msopo nami mosa tmapaq qsiya ka kana tnsapah nami.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡游泳，放假的時候，我們全家會一起去游泳。
I like swimming. During the holidays, our whole family go swimming together.

S.FORM: Smkuxul ku psdupung burah ka yaku, kiya ka malu nami msupu muyas uyas mi tmapaq qsiya.
Smkoxol ko psdopong borah ka yako, kiya ka malo nami msopo moyas oyas mi tmapaq qsiya.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡認識新朋友，我們可以一起唱歌和游泳。
I love meeting new people, we can sing and swim together.

S.FORM: Laqi ku Sediq ka yaku.
Laqi ko Sediq ka yako.
S.TRANSL: 我是賽徳克族的小孩。
I am an Sediq child.

S.FORM: Wa mniq Toda ka sapah nami.
Wa mniq Toda ka sapah nami.
S.TRANSL: 我們家住在都達。
Our family lives in Toda.

S.FORM: Niqan rima hiyi sediq ka knkana tnsapah nami.
Niqan rima hiyi sediq ka knkana tnsapah nami.
S.TRANSL: 我們家共有五個人。
There are five people in our family.

S.FORM: Niqan turu mnswayi ka tnsapah nami.
Niqan toro mnswayi ka tnsapah nami.
S.TRANSL: 我們家有三個兄弟姊妹。
There are three brothers and sisters in our family.

S.FORM: Msupu nami mniq sapah ka tama, bubu, qbsuran snaw, qbsuran qridin mi yaku.
Msopo nami mniq sapah ka tama, bobo, qbsoran snaw, qbsoran qridin mi yako.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥和姊姊住在一起。
I live with my father, mother, brother and sister.

S.FORM: Beyhing bay ka tama mu, keysacu ka tama mu.
Beyhing bay ka tama mo, keysaco ka tama mo.
S.TRANSL: 我的爸爸很高，我的爸爸是警察。
My father is tall and he is a policeman.

S.FORM: Mliwang bay ka bubu mu, ising ka bubu mu.
Mliwang bay ka bobo mo, ising ka bobo mo.
S.TRANSL: 我的媽媽很瘦，我的媽媽是醫生。
My mother is thin and my mom is a doctor.

S.FORM: Mniq sapah ka tama pa, mpprngaw nami kari sediq ka yami.
Mniq sapah ka tama pa, mpprngaw nami kari sediq ka yami.
S.TRANSL: 爸爸在家會和我們說族語。
My father speaks the ethnic language with us at home.

S.FORM: Musa nami alang msangay rbawan ka yami.
Mosa nami alang msangay rbawan ka yami.
S.TRANSL: 我們暑假都會回部落。
We will all go back to the tribe during the summer vacation.

S.FORM: Musa nami msupu qmraq crayux ka yami qbsuran mu.
Mosa nami msopo qmraq crayox ka yami qbsoran mo.
S.TRANSL: 我和兄姊會一起抓青蛙。
My brothers and sisters and I will catch frogs together.

S.FORM: Smkuxul ku bay tnsapah nami ka yaku.
Smkoxol ko bay tnsapah nami ka yako.
S.TRANSL: 我很喜歡我們家的人。
I like our family very much.

S.FORM: Msupu ku bubu mu musa mppulah nganguc ka diyax saya.
Msopo ko bobo mo mosa mppolah ngangoc ka diyax saya.
S.TRANSL: 今天我和媽媽出去玩。
I went out with my mother today.

S.FORM: Mslingaw bay qtan diyan ka karac, ini kskuy mi ktilux, mtltu balay ka niyuk bwihur.
Mslingaw bay qtan diyan ka karac, ini kskoy mi ktilox, mtlto balay ka niyok bwihor.
S.TRANSL: 白天的天空很藍，天氣不冷也不熱，風很涼爽。
The sky is blue during the day, the weather is neither cold nor hot, and the wind is cool.

S.FORM: Tlung nami babaw spriq dxral mkan nami emu, thdawan hidaw ka hiyi nami, muxul balay.
Tlong nami babaw spriq dxral mkan nami emo, thdawan hidaw ka hiyi nami, moxol balay.
S.TRANSL: 我們在草地上吃著麵包，陽光灑在身上，非常溫暖。
We ate bread on the grass, the sun was shining on us, and it was very warm.

S.FORM: Babaw cka hidaw, asi knpriyux mbanah ka karac da.
Babaw cka hidaw, asi knpriyox mbanah ka karac da.
S.TRANSL: 下午，天空變紅了。
In the afternoon, the sky turned red.

S.FORM: Smiling ku bubu mu hmuya hu ma mbanah ka karac da.
Smiling ko bobo mo hmoya ho ma mbanah ka karac da.
S.TRANSL: 我問媽媽，為甚麼天空是紅色的。
I asked my mother why the sky is red.

S.FORM: rmngaw kari ka bubu, ya bay miyah ka bwihur beyhing da.
rmngaw kari ka bobo, ya bay miyah ka bwihor beyhing da.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽說，可能是颱風要來了。
Mom said, maybe the typhoon is coming.

S.FORM: Kman uka qtan rulung ka karac, pcriyu kana ka pngerah.
Kman oka qtan rolong ka karac, pcriyo kana ka pngerah.
S.TRANSL: 晚上天上沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky at night, and the stars came out.

S.FORM: Musa nami sapah ka yami uri da.
Mosa nami sapah ka yami ori da.
S.TRANSL: 我們也要回家了。
We were going home too.

S.FORM: Mklelu musa sapah cida, mquri ku pngerah dmurun sngtangan.
Mklelo mosa sapah cida, mqori ko pngerah dmoron sngtangan.
S.TRANSL: 在回家的路上，我跟星星許願。
On the way home, I made a wish with the stars,

S.FORM: Sngtangan mu u kani iyah ka paru bwihur, mkmusa ku ppulah nganguc nina.
Sngtangan mo o kani iyah ka paro bwihor, mkmosa ko ppolah ngangoc nina.
S.TRANSL: 希望颱風不要來，我還想再出去玩。
I hope the typhoon doesn't come, I still want to go out to play again.

S.FORM: Wa mniq siyaw sapah nami ka sapah pyasan, mksa nami kddiyax musa sapah pyasan, mmiyah sapah da u mksa nami uri.
Wa mniq siyaw sapah nami ka sapah pyasan, mksa nami kddiyax mosa sapah pyasan, mmiyah sapah da o mksa nami ori.
S.TRANSL: 我的學校在我們家旁邊，我天天走路去學校，也走路回家。
My school is next to our house, I walk to school every day, and I also walk home.

S.FORM: Uxay kiya paru ka sapah pyasan nami, alaw ini khbaraw ka mpuyas, kiya u mkkla nami kana.
Uxay kiya paro ka sapah pyasan nami, alaw ini khbaraw ka mpoyas, kiya o mkkla nami kana.
S.TRANSL: 我們學校不大，沒有很多學生，大家互相認識。
Our school is not big, there are not many students, everyone knows each other.

S.FORM: msangay ka lqlaqi han, mssli undoba kana, msupu mppulah psboru mi mpprngaw.
msangay ka lqlaqi han, mssli ondoba kana, msopo mppolah psboro mi mpprngaw.
S.TRANSL: 所有小朋友會聚在操場，一起玩球、一起聊天。
All the children will gather in the playground, play ball and chat together.

S.FORM: Msupu mppulah yami uri ka mptusa, mntna balay kingal paru tnsapah ka sapah pyasan.
Msopo mppolah yami ori ka mptosa, mntna balay kingal paro tnsapah ka sapah pyasan.
S.TRANSL: 老師們也會和我們一起玩，學校是個大家庭。
The teachers also play with us, the school is one big family.

S.FORM: Smksik nami kddiyax ka yami, bliqan nami smksik ka sapah pyasan.
Smksik nami kddiyax ka yami, bliqan nami smksik ka sapah pyasan.
S.TRANSL: 我們每天都要打掃，大家要把教室打掃乾淨。
We have to clean every day, and everyone has to clean the classroom.

S.FORM: Duma u musa smurus wawi bnlingan, uxay uri u musa smksik duma.
Doma o mosa smoros wawi bnlingan, oxay ori o mosa smksik doma.
S.TRANSL: 有些人去擦窗戶，有些人去掃地。
Some people clean the windows, some sweep the floor.

S.FORM: Kana iyax mi muxi sapah pyasan pa, dan nami smksik kana, msasu mi mddayaw nami kana, maku lux ini krutiq kddiyax ka sapah pyasan.
Kana iyax mi moxi sapah pyasan pa, dan nami smksik kana, msaso mi mddayaw nami kana, mako lox ini krotiq kddiyax ka sapah pyasan.
S.TRANSL: 我們還會打掃學校的各個角落，大家分工合作，學校每天都不髒。
We will also clean every corner of the school. Everyone works together, and the school is very clean every day.

S.FORM: Ciwa, nusa ku alang tqita tama rudan mu.
Ciwa, nosa ko alang tqita tama rodan mo.
S.TRANSL: 昨天，我去部落拜訪爺爺。
Yesterday, I went to visit my grandpa in the tribe.

S.FORM: Bsiyaq nami ini pqqita da, lnglungun mu balay ka hiya.
Bsiyaq nami ini pqqita da, lnglongon mo balay ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我們很久沒有見面了，我很想念他。
We haven’t seen each other for a long time and I miss him a lot.

S.FORM: Qmita knan ka tama rudan, kiya ka qdalan ku na sika, pmahun ku na ociya.
Qmita knan ka tama rodan, kiya ka qdalan ko na sika, pmahon ko na ociya.
S.TRANSL: 爺爺一看到我，就請我吃西瓜，請我喝茶。
As soon as grandpa saw me, he invited me to eat watermelon and drink tea.

S.FORM: Ssibus balay uqan ka sika hnuma tama rudan, malu balay uqun.
Ssibos balay oqan ka sika hnoma tama rodan, malo balay oqon.
S.TRANSL: 爺爺種的西瓜很甜，真的很好吃。
The watermelon grown by grandpa is very sweet and really delicious.

S.FORM: Smkuxul ku ociya tama rudan uri, malu bay mahun.
Smkoxol ko ociya tama rodan ori, malo bay mahon.
S.TRANSL: 我也喜歡爺爺的茶，也很好喝。
I also like grandpa’s tea, it’s tasted good too.

S.FORM: Cka hidaw cida, msupu ku pchada uqun cka hidaw bubu rudan.
Cka hidaw cida, msopo ko pchada oqon cka hidaw bobo rodan.
S.TRANSL: 中午的時候，我和奶奶一起煮午餐。
At noon, I cooked lunch with my grandma.

S.FORM: Ou balay pnchada na uqun cka hidaw ka bubu rudan, niqan qcurux, rodux, bawan mi pngucun uri.
Oo balay pnchada na oqon cka hidaw ka bobo rodan, niqan qcorox, rodox, bawan mi pngocon ori.
S.TRANSL: 奶奶煮了很豐盛的午餐，有魚、有雞、有南瓜、還有蝸牛。
Grandma cooked a big lunch, including fish, chicken, pumpkin, and snails.

S.FORM: Babaw mnkan nami cka hidaw daw, musa nami kmtuy hnuma na sama da.
Babaw mnkan nami cka hidaw daw, mosa nami kmtoy hnoma na sama da.
S.TRANSL: 吃完午餐後，我們去菜園摘菜。
After lunch, we went to the vegetable garden to pick vegetables.

S.FORM: Mangal ou bay bunga, sari mi qucun sbuway na knan ka bubu rudan, spadas ku na miyah sapah.
Mangal oo bay bonga, sari mi qocon sboway na knan ka bobo rodan, spadas ko na miyah sapah.
S.TRANSL: 奶奶拿了很多地瓜、芋頭和蕗蕎給我，要我帶回家。
Grandma brought me a lot of sweet potatoes, taro and buckwheat, and asked me to take them home.

S.FORM: Smwayay ku dhiya da, rngawan mu musa ku qmita dhiya ka nduray dungan.
Smwayay ko dhiya da, rngawan mo mosa ko qmita dhiya ka ndoray dongan.
S.TRANSL: 我跟他們道別，說下次再去看他們。
I said goodbye to them and said I’d see them next time.

S.FORM: Diyax saya pa dsan nami na han mita ccamac ka mptusa, tbku nami rhngun hhan mari kipu.
Diyax saya pa dsan nami na han mita ccamac ka mptosa, tbko nami rhngon hhan mari kipo.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師帶我們去動物園，我們在門口排隊買票。
Today the teacher took us to the zoo, and we lined up at the gate to buy tickets.

S.FORM: Mtmay nami han mita ccamac daw, rmngaw ka mptusa, "Kluwan qduda ka brah, kluwan quyu ka bukuy, usa nanaq thuway sdmhaw qmita."
Mtmay nami han mita ccamac daw, rmngaw ka mptosa, "Klowan qdoda ka brah, klowan qoyo ka bokoy, osa nanaq thoway sdmhaw qmita."
S.TRANSL: so you can visit them yourself.""
After entering the zoo, the teacher said, There are birds in the front and snakes in the back

S.FORM: Micu ku qmita quyu ka yaku, so kiya ini ku qita kluwan quyu.
Mico ko qmita qoyo ka yako, so kiya ini ko qita klowan qoyo.
S.TRANSL: 我會怕蛇，所以我不看蛇類。
I'm afraid of snakes, so I don't look at snakes.

S.FORM: Ou balay qduda ka wada mu qtan, wa skaya babaw qhuni, qmnita nami tukung wa mtaqi bling qhuni uri.
Oo balay qdoda ka wada mo qtan, wa skaya babaw qhoni, qmnita nami tokong wa mtaqi bling qhoni ori.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了很多鳥，他們在樹上飛來飛去，還有看到貓頭鷹在樹洞裡睡覺。
I saw a lot of birds flying around in the trees and saw owls sleeping in tree hollows.

S.FORM: Kcka han mita ccamac pa hay, niqan dapa ngucun, dapa dmay mi lklic, kndadax cuxal u uxay mu bay qtan ka ccamac ni, mqras ku balay wada mu qtaun diyax saya da.
Kcka han mita ccamac pa hay, niqan dapa ngocon, dapa dmay mi lklic, kndadax coxal o oxay mo bay qtan ka ccamac ni, mqras ko balay wada mo qtaon diyax saya da.
S.TRANSL: 動物園裡有大象、馬和老虎，我從前沒有看過這些動物，今天看到了真的很開心。
There are elephants, horses and tigers in the zoo. I have never seen these animals before. I was really happy to see them today.

S.FORM: Ou balay pnsingan mu sasing saya, han mu pqita tama mi bubu mu.
Oo balay pnsingan mo sasing saya, han mo pqita tama mi bobo mo.
S.TRANSL: 我拍了很多照片，給爸爸媽媽看。
I took a lot of pictures and showed them to my parents.

S.FORM: Babaw niya daw, tuhuy tama bubu msupu miyah.
Babaw niya daw, tohoy tama bobo msopo miyah.
S.TRANSL: 下次要跟爸爸媽媽一起來。
Next time I will come with my parents.

S.FORM: Diyax sngayan ni pa, tuhuy ku qbsuran qridin musa nami Tayto qmita swayi snaw tama.
Diyax sngayan ni pa, tohoy ko qbsoran qridin mosa nami Tayto qmita swayi snaw tama.
S.TRANSL: 這個假日，我和姊姊去台東拜訪叔叔。
This holiday, my sister and I went to Taitung to visit my uncle.

S.FORM: Kndadax nami Tayhoku tapa kisya musa Tayto.
Kndadax nami Tayhoko tapa kisya mosa Tayto.
S.TRANSL: 我們從台北搭火車去臺東。
We took the train from Taipei to Taitung.

S.FORM: Dhuq Tayto da u, swayi snaw tama pa mriq rulu miyah smtrung yami.
Dhoq Tayto da o, swayi snaw tama pa mriq rolo miyah smtrong yami.
S.TRANSL: 到了台東，叔叔開車來車站接我們。
When we arrived in Taitung, my uncle drove to the station to pick us up.

S.FORM: Ppanan kisya dhuq sapah swayi snaw tama u ini sthiyaq balay, mriq rulu pa hay tnayis da u dhuq da.
Ppanan kisya dhoq sapah swayi snaw tama o ini sthiyaq balay, mriq rolo pa hay tnayis da o dhoq da.
S.TRANSL: 車站離叔叔家沒有很遠，開車一下子就到了。
The station is not far from my uncle's house, and it's just a short drive away.

S.FORM: Niqan beyhing bay tbuwan ka dalih sapah swayi snaw tama, msupu nami mriq ddeyngsya musa tbuwan hiya.
Niqan beyhing bay tbowan ka dalih sapah swayi snaw tama, msopo nami mriq ddeyngsya mosa tbowan hiya.
S.TRANSL: 叔叔家附近有個很大的牧場，我們一起騎腳踏車到牧場。
There is a big ranch near my uncle's house, and we rode bicycles to the ranch together.

S.FORM: Mniq nami tbuwan hiya, han nami na ptabu miric mi tapa dapa dmayi ka swayi snaw tama.
Mniq nami tbowan hiya, han nami na ptabo miric mi tapa dapa dmayi ka swayi snaw tama.
S.TRANSL: 在牧場，叔叔帶我們餵羊和騎馬。
In the ranch, my uncle took us to feed the sheep and ride horses.

S.FORM: Kman daw, msupu nami musa alang mkbrnux han nami na pkan idaw.
Kman daw, msopo nami mosa alang mkbrnox han nami na pkan idaw.
S.TRANSL: 晚上，我們一起去市區吃飯。
In the evening, we went to the city to have dinner together.

S.FORM: Kari balay rulu ka alang mkbrnux, so kiya mriq nami otobay musa hiya.
Kari balay rolo ka alang mkbrnox, so kiya mriq nami otobay mosa hiya.
S.TRANSL: 市區車子很多，所以我們騎摩托車去那裡。
There are a lot of cars in the city, so we go there by motorcycle.

S.FORM: Smwayay nami cida, kla wada uyun ka otobay nami da, kiya u asi nami tapa basu miyah da.
Smwayay nami cida, kla wada oyon ka otobay nami da, kiya o asi nami tapa baso miyah da.
S.TRANSL: 要離開的時候，發現摩托車被偷了，我們只好搭公車離開。
When we were about to leave, we found that the motorcycle had been stolen, so we had to leave by bus.

S.FORM: Ni nami dhuq Tayhoku ka saya da, ya na wa sndalan ka otobay swayi snaw tama da hu?
Ni nami dhoq Tayhoko ka saya da, ya na wa sndalan ka otobay swayi snaw tama da ho?
S.TRANSL: 現在我們回到台北了，不知道叔叔的摩托車找到了沒有。
Now that we are back in Taipei, I don't know if my uncle's motorcycle has been found.

S.FORM: Claqi nami tiping cida, mneniq nami alang Toda han, prading ku musa muyas sapah pyasan daw, musa nami thdil Hori da, ana dhuq saya; ida mniq alang mkbrnux ka kndusan nami.
Claqi nami tiping cida, mneniq nami alang Toda han, prading ko mosa moyas sapah pyasan daw, mosa nami thdil Hori da, ana dhoq saya; ida mniq alang mkbrnox ka kndosan nami.
S.TRANSL: 小時候我們家住在都達，上學以後，就搬到了埔里，一直在都市裡生活。
When we were young, our family lived in Toda . After I started school, we moved to Puli and have been living in the city ever since.

S.FORM: Babaw mnusa ku muyas tubeyhing sapah pyasan daw, prading ku smluhay slhayan wowaya Sediq tnpusu ka yaku da, wada ku mkla ou balay kkluwan waya Sediq tnpusu Taiwan.
Babaw mnosa ko moyas tobeyhing sapah pyasan daw, prading ko smlohay slhayan wowaya Sediq tnposo ka yako da, wada ko mkla oo balay kklowan waya Sediq tnposo Taiwan.
S.TRANSL: 上了大學以後，我修了一堂關於原住民文化的課程，瞭解到臺灣原住民族有各式各樣豐富的文化。
After I went to college, I took a course on aboriginal culture and learned that the aboriginal people in Taiwan have various and rich cultures.

S.FORM: So kiya, sngayan rbawan kngkawas ni cida, musa nami smiling rdrudan alang ka yami qbsuran mu snaw, iyux nami mkla wowaya Sediq ta nanaq.
So kiya, sngayan rbawan kngkawas ni cida, mosa nami smiling rdrodan alang ka yami qbsoran mo snaw, iyox nami mkla wowaya Sediq ta nanaq.
S.TRANSL: 因此，今年暑假時，我和哥哥回到部落訪問老人家，想要瞭解自己族群的文化。
So this summer, my brother and I went back to our tribe to visit the elderly, hoping to understand the culture of our own ethnic group.

S.FORM: Mspac kmxalan ka kngkawas rudan ni da, binaw qtan u mkkray balay ka hnyuwan niya, so hari mrisaw na.
Mspac kmxalan ka kngkawas rodan ni da, binaw qtan o mkkray balay ka hnyowan niya, so hari mrisaw na.
S.TRANSL: 老人家已經八十歲了，但是看起來還像中年人。
The old man is already eighty years old, but he still looks like a middle-aged man.

S.FORM: Slingan mu ka hiya, piya kluwan kari ka klaun na rmngaw, mndungus balay ka rrngaw na kari Sediq Toda, ana kari Bunun, kari Hakka mi kari Tanah Tunux uri pa, klaun na rmngaw kana.
Slingan mo ka hiya, piya klowan kari ka klaon na rmngaw, mndongos balay ka rrngaw na kari Sediq Toda, ana kari Bonon, kari Hakka mi kari Tanah Tonox ori pa, klaon na rmngaw kana.
S.TRANSL: 我問他會哪些語言，他的都達說得很流利，也會說布農語、客家話和日本話。
I asked him which languages he knew, and he was fluent in Toda, as well as Bunu, Hakka and Japanese.

S.FORM: Smling ku hiya da u hana ku mkla, kla uri laqi cida ka hiya pa tna sneluhay kari Tanah Tunux da, qridin na u Sediq Bunun, kiya mi mniq qpahun na u wada ppkla hbaraw Sediq Hakka, so kiya hay mkla rmngaw ou kluwanan kari ka hiya.

Smling ko hiya da o hana ko mkla, kla ori laqi cida ka hiya pa tna snelohay kari Tanah Tonox da, qridin na o Sediq Bonon, kiya mi mniq qpahon na o wada ppkla hbaraw Sediq Hakka, so kiya hay mkla rmngaw oo klowanan kari ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我問他才知道，原來他小時候就學日本話，太太是布農族人，而他工作上認識許多客家人，所以他會說這麼多語言。
I asked him to find out that he learned Japanese when he was a child, his wife is an Bunu, and he knows many Hakkas at work, so he can speak so many languages.

S.FORM: Pprngaw nami cida, ou balay prngawan nami mqquri pkla waya tmcamac ka rudan ni.
Pprngaw nami cida, oo balay prngawan nami mqqori pkla waya tmcamac ka rodan ni.
S.TRANSL: 我們訪談的時候，老人家談論了許多關於狩獵的傳統知識。
During our interview, the old man talked about a lot of traditional knowledge about hunting.

S.FORM: Ana wada ini klayi hari mbahang duma ka kari niya, binaw wada nami dmuwi qnawan ddilun psueyga, malu mu ndwanun mbahang dungan.
Ana wada ini klayi hari mbahang doma ka kari niya, binaw wada nami dmowi qnawan ddilon psoeyga, malo mo ndwanon mbahang dongan.
S.TRANSL: 雖然我們沒有辦法完全聽懂，但是我們有用手機錄影，可以再仔細聆聽。
Although we could’t fully understand it, we could record it on our cell phones and listen to it more.

S.FORM: Claqi ku cida, ini mu hari klayi ka wowaya mu nanaq, maku ku msiqa hari hyuwan mu nanaq sediq tnpusu.
Claqi ko cida, ini mo hari klayi ka wowaya mo nanaq, mako ko msiqa hari hyowan mo nanaq sediq tnposo.
S.TRANSL: 小時候我不瞭解自己族群的文化，對於自己是原住民有點不好意思。
When I was young, I didn’t understand the culture of my ethnic group, and I was a little embarrassed that I was an aborigine.

S.FORM: Kndudul ou ka klaun mu da u, wada ku krinah qmita Sediq ka hnyuwan mu nanaq pa, tnnanaq balay kiya, niqan ririh na pskuraw mu balay uri.
Kndodol oo ka klaon mo da o, wada ko krinah qmita Sediq ka hnyowan mo nanaq pa, tnnanaq balay kiya, niqan ririh na pskoraw mo balay ori.
S.TRANSL: 瞭解愈多以後，愈覺得自己身為賽德克族人，是很獨特的，也很值得驕傲。
The more I know, the more I feel that being a Sediq is unique and something to be proud of.

S.FORM: Bbiyan saya mmiyah sapah swayi mu snaw.
Bbiyan saya mmiyah sapah swayi mo snaw.
S.TRANSL: 今天傍晚，弟弟就要回家了。
My younger brother is going home this evening.

S.FORM: Musa nami sapah bbriyun mari rodux ka yami bubu rudan, hpuyu nami kman spkan swayi mu snaw.
Mosa nami sapah bbriyon mari rodox ka yami bobo rodan, hpoyo nami kman spkan swayi mo snaw.
S.TRANSL: 我和奶奶去市場買雞，準備煮好吃的晚餐給弟弟。
My grandma and I went to the market to buy chickens and prepared a delicious dinner for my younger brother.

S.FORM: Mnuda nami sapah bbriyan sama, mtna so balay hana snqitan kana ka sama.
Mnoda nami sapah bbriyan sama, mtna so balay hana snqitan kana ka sama.
S.TRANSL: 我們經過了菜攤，有好多新鮮的青菜。
We passed the vegetable stand, which had a lot of fresh green vegetables.

S.FORM: Wada nami mari eyncay, lmbay mi ningjing da.
Wada nami mari eyncay, lmbay mi ningjing da.
S.TRANSL: 我們買了空心菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。
We bought water spinach, yams and carrots.

S.FORM: Rmngaw ka tawkey ssiyaw mbari hiyi pnwalang, "Chiya balay ka hiyi pnwalang kalac mi aring mu ni, briwi tikuh pa!"
Rmngaw ka tawkey ssiyaw mbari hiyi pnwalang, "Chiya balay ka hiyi pnwalang kalac mi aring mo ni, briwi tikoh pa!"
S.TRANSL: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”

S.FORM: Bnari nami kalac mi aring ka yami.
Bnari nami kalac mi aring ka yami.
S.TRANSL: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。
We bought pineapples and peaches.

S.FORM: Muda nami bbriyan hiyi wawa, rmngaw ka mbari, "Manu ka briyun su? Mtbnaw beyring mi msiyang ka rodux saya, kingal u turu kbkuy hbangan .
Moda nami bbriyan hiyi wawa, rmngaw ka mbari, "Mano ka briyon so? Mtbnaw beyring mi msiyang ka rodox saya, kingal o toro kbkoy hbangan .
S.TRANSL: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說:「你要買什麼?今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today's chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”

S.FORM: Lmngelung ka bubu rudan u mkray balay da, smiling nami tawkey; ya malu mhnuk hari briwan.
Lmngelong ka bobo rodan o mkray balay da, smiling nami tawkey; ya malo mhnok hari briwan.
S.TRANSL: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.

S.FORM: Rmngaw ka mbari ou wada mu lihan da, uka brahan llihan da.
Rmngaw ka mbari oo wada mo lihan da, oka brahan llihan da.
S.TRANSL: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.

S.FORM: Lmawa ka tawkey siyaw, awah mari qcurux mu, paru mi mhnuk briyan ka qcurux mu.
Lmawa ka tawkey siyaw, awah mari qcorox mo, paro mi mhnok briyan ka qcorox mo.
S.TRANSL: 隔壁的老闆說，來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.

S.FORM: Hiti balay daw wada nami mari rodux mi qcurux da, mbrinah sapah pchada kingal handay damac.
Hiti balay daw wada nami mari rodox mi qcorox da, mbrinah sapah pchada kingal handay damac.
S.TRANSL: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.

S.FORM: Bsiyaq nami bay tmawa, maku balay mkung ka karac da.
Bsiyaq nami bay tmawa, mako balay mkong ka karac da.
S.TRANSL: 等了好久，天已經黑了。
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.

S.FORM: Miyah qnawan na rmngaw ka swayi mu snaw, mbarah ini psangay ka qnpringan heytay da, asi ka babaw iyax sngayan ka mbrinah miyah da.
Miyah qnawan na rmngaw ka swayi mo snaw, mbarah ini psangay ka qnpringan heytay da, asi ka babaw iyax sngayan ka mbrinah miyah da.
S.TRANSL: 弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn't take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.

S.FORM: Rmngaw ka bubu rudan wada pchada ou bay uqun, plwani kana ka dhiya awah msupu mkan pa!
Rmngaw ka bobo rodan wada pchada oo bay oqon, plwani kana ka dhiya awah msopo mkan pa!
S.TRANSL: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多食物，叫大家一起來吃吧!
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let's eat together!

S.FORM: Plwani kana ka dadal mi dupung, miyah msupu tblayaq mkan mttuku bay pnchada uqun kman.
Plwani kana ka dadal mi dopong, miyah msopo tblayaq mkan mttoko bay pnchada oqon kman.
S.TRANSL: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.

S.FORM: Niqan kingal tnhiqan mu, Temu ka hangan na, cmhungi bay madas qqiya na kdiyax ka hiya.
Niqan kingal tnhiqan mo, Temo ka hangan na, cmhongi bay madas qqiya na kdiyax ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我有一個同學叫Temu，他常常忘記帶東西。
I have a classmate named Temu, he often forgets to bring things.

S.FORM: Muyas slhayan cida, knbarux impicu mi ssurus, uxay daw patas btasun tnhiqan muyas ka hiya.
Moyas slhayan cida, knbarox impico mi ssoros, oxay daw patas btason tnhiqan moyas ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.

S.FORM: Mntxal, mdha, mturu, kbrxan dha qqiya kddiyax.
Mntxal, mdha, mtoro, kbrxan dha qqiya kddiyax.
S.TRANSL: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.

S.FORM: Binaw niqan hari qnnaqah na, kiya bay knbarux qqiya daw ini iyah muway da.
Binaw niqan hari qnnaqah na, kiya bay knbarox qqiya daw ini iyah moway da.
S.TRANSL: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.

S.FORM: Babaw niya ini dha kuxi pkbarux qqiya da.
Babaw niya ini dha koxi pkbarox qqiya da.
S.TRANSL: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.

S.FORM: Niqan kingal diyax, msupu nami musa rmiwaw kana nami.
Niqan kingal diyax, msopo nami mosa rmiwaw kana nami.
S.TRANSL: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。
One day, we all went on an outing together.

S.FORM: Mklelu cida, mkmusa nganguc ka Temu, binaw cmhungi madas crugamey ka hiya.
Mklelo cida, mkmosa ngangoc ka Temo, binaw cmhongi madas crogamey ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 路途中，Temu想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。
On the way, Temu wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.

S.FORM: Knbarux crugamey tnhiqan muyas ka hiya, binaw cmiyuk rmngaw ka kana dha, ini nami adas uri wah.
Knbarox crogamey tnhiqan moyas ka hiya, binaw cmiyok rmngaw ka kana dha, ini nami adas ori wah.
S.TRANSL: 他跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說，我也沒有帶耶。
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.

S.FORM: Makulu saw msang lmingis rmngaw ka Temu, ma ana sa klabuy ssrus sulay, ini namu pkbarux kana!
Makolo saw msang lmingis rmngaw ka Temo, ma ana sa klaboy ssros solay, ini namo pkbarox kana!
S.TRANSL: Temu急的哭了出來。他生氣的說，為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙!
Temu burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!

S.FORM: Rmngaw hiya ka tnhiqan muyas, alaw su ini balay adas nanaq, kiya mi knbarux su qqiya u, mluhay su ini brihi muway!
Rmngaw hiya ka tnhiqan moyas, alaw so ini balay adas nanaq, kiya mi knbarox so qqiya o, mlohay so ini brihi moway!
S.TRANSL: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!

S.FORM: Musa sapah pyasan ka so kusun, tna mrbu balay dhuq sapah pyasan ka Temu da, Temu pa knbrxan na qqiya tnhiqan muyas u, skngalun na pbrinah muway dtnhiqan muyas kana.
Mosa sapah pyasan ka so koson, tna mrbo balay dhoq sapah pyasan ka Temo da, Temo pa knbrxan na qqiya tnhiqan moyas o, skngalon na pbrinah moway dtnhiqan moyas kana.
S.TRANSL: 隔天上學，Temu很早就到學校了，Temu把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。
The next day at school, Temu arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.

S.FORM: Rmngaw thiqan na matas ka Temu, srwayi ka qnnaqah mu. babaw niya, madas ku nanaq qqiya da, mhuway namu balay kana, pkbarux namu qqiya yaku.
Rmngaw thiqan na matas ka Temo, srwayi ka qnnaqah mo. babaw niya, madas ko nanaq qqiya da, mhoway namo balay kana, pkbarox namo qqiya yako.
S.TRANSL: Temu向同學們道歉，並說他以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。
Temu apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.

S.FORM: Alang sediq hini, mkla bay tmcamac ka tama mu.
Alang sediq hini, mkla bay tmcamac ka tama mo.
S.TRANSL: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.

S.FORM: Claqi ku cida, tama mu mi swayi snaw tama pa hay; mniq kman musa nganguc, madas puting mi puniq musa tncamac.
Claqi ko cida, tama mo mi swayi snaw tama pa hay; mniq kman mosa ngangoc, madas poting mi poniq mosa tncamac.
S.TRANSL: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍去打獵。
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.

S.FORM: Mncul mangal boyak mi mncul mangal rapic, kiya mi mncul mangal ulaqan uri.
Mncol mangal boyak mi mncol mangal rapic, kiya mi mncol mangal olaqan ori.
S.TRANSL: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.

S.FORM: Mniq tmayan alang; dwanun dha masu sediq alang ka nangal dha ccamac.
Mniq tmayan alang; dwanon dha maso sediq alang ka nangal dha ccamac.
S.TRANSL: 他們會在村口將獵物分享給族人。
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.

S.FORM: Knttu ku rmngaw tama mu, mpsnul ku tama musa mcbu camac lmiqu.
Kntto ko rmngaw tama mo, mpsnol ko tama mosa mcbo camac lmiqo.
S.TRANSL: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.

S.FORM: Rngawan ku na ka tama mu "Paru su daw, kiya dsun misu mcbu mi posa wasil da."
Rngawan ko na ka tama mo "Paro so daw, kiya dson miso mcbo mi posa wasil da."
S.TRANSL: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.

S.FORM: Mkla musa dmurang ccmac lmiqu ka snaw alang, posa snalu na srak mi dmangar uri.
Mkla mosa dmorang ccmac lmiqo ka snaw alang, posa snalo na srak mi dmangar ori.
S.TRANSL: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.

S.FORM: Mkla bay smalu durang ka tama mu, rmngaw ka "tama, ddiyun qmraq tkurih ka ni, asi bay klaun kmuruy ta dapil camac ka ita, psaun tuqar camac ka durang.
Mkla bay smalo dorang ka tama mo, rmngaw ka "tama, ddiyon qmraq tkorih ka ni, asi bay klaon kmoroy ta dapil camac ka ita, psaon toqar camac ka dorang.
S.TRANSL: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.

S.FORM: Alaw iyux ku bay nhari smnul drudan musa tncamac, kddiyax ku smluhay smalu durang, ida kiya so balay bay ini biyaw qmraq ccamac ka smnalu mu durang da.
Alaw iyox ko bay nhari smnol drodan mosa tncamac, kddiyax ko smlohay smalo dorang, ida kiya so balay bay ini biyaw qmraq ccamac ka smnalo mo dorang da.
S.TRANSL: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practice making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.

S.FORM: Qmita ka tama mu da u rmngaw knan, hiti daw qulung ku mosa msediq balay mkla tncamac ka yaku.
Qmita ka tama mo da o rmngaw knan, hiti daw qolong ko mosa msediq balay mkla tncamac ka yako.
S.TRANSL: 爸爸看到後對我說我以後一定會是很厲害的獵人。
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.

S.FORM: Paru ku mnhdu mdakil ka saya da, mapa ku nanaq bhniq mi budi mu, smnul ku tama mu msupu musa tncamac.
Paro ko mnhdo mdakil ka saya da, mapa ko nanaq bhniq mi bodi mo, smnol ko tama mo msopo mosa tncamac.
S.TRANSL: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.

S.FORM: Dhuq alang cida, nangal dha camac u psun dha masu dsediq alang.
Dhoq alang cida, nangal dha camac o pson dha maso dsediq alang.
S.TRANSL: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.

S.FORM: Rmngaw ka tama, qrasun ta dmahur ka Utux Tmninun pndungus snbliqan, dhuq ta mangal ou bay ccamac, kiya mi dhurun ta ka utux rudan uri, msupu ta mqaras kana!
Rmngaw ka tama, qrason ta dmahor ka Utox Tmninon pndongos snbliqan, dhoq ta mangal oo bay ccamac, kiya mi dhoron ta ka otox rodan ori, msopo ta mqaras kana!
S.TRANSL: 爸爸說，我們要感謝編織之神的賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫，並告慰祖靈；一同歡樂!
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.

S.FORM: Sqcuqi ku musa sapah pyasan ka mrbu da.
Sqcoqi ko mosa sapah pyasan ka mrbo da.
S.TRANSL: 我早上上學遲到了。
I was late for school this morning.

S.FORM: Musa sapah pyasan cida pa, cmhungi ku madas kabang patas da.
